/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. On either side of the road, there are trees and buildings, adding to the urban landscape. In the distance, a bridge can be seen, connecting two parts of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky contrasting with the gray of the road and the buildings. The image does not provide any specific details that could be used to identify the exact location of this street in Beijing.
